_comment_primary_metric: primary_metric: bb_lddt, bb_lddt_cov (lDDT×Coverage), binder_lddt (binder), interface_lddt, iptm, tm_score, etc. Used for z-score ranking.

problems.name: Problem 7 - 2-Helix with a loop
problems.description: Design a sequence for a 2-helix with a loop (28 residues)

problems.name: Problem 8 - 2-Helix with a loop (No MSA)
problems.description: Design a sequence for a 2-helix with a loop (28 residues) without MSA

problems.name: Problem 9 - 1-Helix
problems.description: Design a sequence for a 2-helix with a loop (20 residues)

problems.name: Problem 10 - 1-Helix w/ beta-Sheet | Partial Prediction
problems.description: Design a sequence for a 1-helix with a beta sheet (56 residues)

problems.name: Problem 11 - 1-Helix w/ beta-Sheet | Partial Prediction
problems.description: Design a sequence for a 1-helix with a beta sheet (56 residues)

problems.name: Problem 12 - 3-Helix | Partial Prediction
problems.description: Design a sequence for a 3-helix (60 residues)

monomer.description: Scaffold design - design a sequence for the given backbone

binder.description: Binder design - design a peptide that binds to the given target

msa_modes.none: No MSA - single sequence, skips MSA search
msa_modes.precomputed: Use pre-calculated MSA file (specify msa_file in problem config)
